fields.headline: Cheap treats in the east
fields.bodyText: Poland Treatments start from as little as £2.47 for an underwater massage at the Geovita Hotel in Krynica. As well as mud and mineral water treatments - famed for treating metabolic diseases - there are peat poultices, paraffin applications and laser bio-stimulation. · 0048 1847 10400, geovita.pl. From £19.76pp per night. EasyJet (0871 7500100, easyjet.com) flies to Krakow from £41 rtn inc tax Latvia Former Soviet holiday hot spot, Jurmala, 20km west of Riga, has excellent beaches and sanatoriums. The Baltic Beach Hotel spa can offer 90-minute volcanic stone massages for £20 and 'sweating' Russian baths with birch broom body sweeps for £27. · 00371 7771400, balticbeach.lv. Ryanair (0871 2460000, ryanair.com) flies to Riga from £38 rtn inc tax. Baltic Holidays (0870 7579233, balticholidays.com) has a three-night package with flights, hotels and transfers for £350 Czech Republic Follow in the footsteps of Marx and Beethoven to the spa town of Karlovy Vary. The 160-year-old Parkhotel Richmond has treatments packed into bargain £38 days or all-inclusives like the Soft Beauty Week for £243. · 00420 353 177111, richmond.cz. BMI (0870 6070555, flybmi.com) flies to Prague from £55 rtn inc tax Slovenia A special spa programme weekend at the Hotel Donat in the traditional spa town of Rogaska Slatina costs £52. · 0038 63811 3000, terme-rogaska.si. Accommodation from £40pp per night half-board. EasyJet flies to Ljubljana from £41 rtn inc tax Hungary The modern Danubius Thermal Hotel Helia in Budapest offers a three-night Mini Spa Package with half-board, three massages, one hydrotherapy session and a Cleopatra bath with milk and honey, as well as yoga, aerobic and aqua jogging for £160. · 0036 1 889 5800, danubiushotels.com/helia. Wizzair (0036 1470 9499, wizzair.com) flies to Budapest from £43 rtn inc tax
